definitions.definition: the act of getting rid of something

examples.text: The council is responsible for **waste disposal** and street cleaning.
the problems of the ultimate disposal of nuclear waste
She was charged with the unlawful disposal of human remains.
The waste must be taken to an approved disposal facility.

definitions.definition: the sale of part of a business, property, etc.

examples.text: The next step is to think about disposal of your assets.

definitions.definition: a machine connected to the waste pipe of a kitchen sink, for cutting food waste into small pieces
available for use as you prefer/somebody prefers

examples.text: He will have a car at his disposal for the whole month.
Well, I'm at your disposal *(= I am ready to help you in any way I can)*.
